attributes.action: Outlaw Radical Islamist, Nazi & all racist hate groups
attributes.additional_details: We call on Her majesty’s Government to impose a compete UK ban on ALL Radical hate groups, whether they be Radical Fundamentalist Islamist groups or Neo Nazi hate groups such as Racist groups/parties/organisations & all groups/parties/organisations that preach anti-Semitism. We request that the UK Government listens to the people & puts a stop to the disgusting racist attacks / anti-Semitic attacks that are occurring up and down the country by these openly hateful groups/parties/organisations. The time has come for the UK to lead the way in stopping this unacceptable & barbaric behaviour & become a beacon for the rest of the world to want to follow.
